name: Car Manufacturer Tycoon
description:
Have you ever wanted to plan, configure, build and sell your own cars? Manage your own car company in Car Manufacturer Tycoon, join hundreds of thousands of players and become the most successful car manufacturer in the world!

CREATE YOUR CARS
You can create and configure your own cars, from agile compacts over powerful sedans and SUVs to rapid sportscars. Make the car yours by configuring every aspect of your car and creating your unique design!

SELL CARS
Assemble your cars in your company's factories and sell them on the market. But watch out - other players are competing for the customers with you!

EXPAND YOUR COMPANY
Expand your company all over the world, in 8 different regions with their own markets and customer preferences! Can you become the world's largest manufacturer?

BUY MATERIALS
Buy materials to use during the production process when the market prices are the lowest - plan ahead to make even more profit when selling your cars.


In case you need support, want to submit personal feedback or suggestions, just email us at io.cyanfox@gmail.com.
